Package Main

Class DrawingSurface

  • java.lang.Object
    • processing.core.PApplet
      • Main.DrawingSurface
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    processing.core.PConstants
    public class DrawingSurface
extends processing.core.PApplet
    The DrawingSurface class is a PApplet with the ability to switch between multiple Screens.
    Author:
    Kyle Fu

      • switchScreen

        public void switchScreen​(int i)
        Switches the currently active screen to the one specified. Use the constants found in DrawingSurface to select the screen.
        Parameters:
        i - The ID of the screen to switch to.

      • getScreen

        public Screen getScreen​(int i)
        Gets a specified Screen object. Use the constants found in DrawingSurface to select the screen.
        Parameters:
        i - The ID of the screen to get.
        Returns:
        The Screen object.

      • playMusic

        public void playMusic​(java.lang.String song)
        Plays the given song (should be a .mp3 file found in the data folder). Loops until stopped.
        Parameters:
        song - The song to play.

      • stopMusic

        public void stopMusic()
        Stops playing music (if any music was playing).

        Parameters:
